DOC.brief_summary: The clinical study design assess effectiveness , safety non-immunogenicity fish skin wound dress extracellular matrix ( ECM ) treat chronic wound . The wound dress indicated management difficult heal chronic wound . The matrix cut fit wind apply wound bed . An absorptive secondary dressing put top . Further dress wound depend etiology . The indication use : - partial full-thickness wound - pressure ulcer - venous ulcer - diabetic ulcer - chronic vascular ulcer - tunneled/undermined wound - trauma wound ( abrasion , laceration , second-degree burn , skin tear )
DOC.brief_title: Use Fish Skin Extracellular Matrix ( ECM ) Facilitate Chronic Wound Healing
DOC.criteria: Venous leg ulcer Arterial leg ulcer Rheumatic leg ulcer Hydrostatic leg ulcer Ulcer heal delay drug therapy Nonhealing ulcer due know unknown cause Active infection
